body:
Ida,






try this:






rzpict -x 600 -y 400  -vp 61 14 -29 -vd -3 -0.4 1 -vu 0 0 1 -av  .6 .6
.6  -o image.pic scene.zoct






the trick is the '-o image.pic'






hope this works,






giulio
